text: Kalbajar-Lachin was one of the 10 former economic regions of Azerbaijan, until the change of economic regions in 2021. Now, Kalbajar-Lachin lies entirely within the East Zangezur economic regions Districts in the region were: * Gubadly (Qubadlı) * Kalbajar (Kəlbəcər) * Lachin (Laçın) * Zangilan (Zəngilan) ==Related pages== *Economic regions of Azerbaijan
title: Kalbajar–Lachin Economic Region
